definition: A person who works in a professional setting, typically in an organization or company, and contributes to the tasks, projects, or goals of the team. This term is commonly used to refer to a female individual fulfilling a role as a member of staff or an employee.

examples.german: Die Mitarbeiterin arbeitet seit fünf Jahren in der Firma.
examples.english: The employee has been working in the company for five years.

examples.german: Die neue Mitarbeiterin ist sehr engagiert und motiviert.
examples.english: The new employee is very dedicated and motivated.

examples.german: Die Mitarbeiterin kümmert sich um die Kundenbetreuung.
examples.english: The employee takes care of customer support.

examples.german: Die Mitarbeiterin hat eine hohe Arbeitsmoral.
examples.english: The employee has a strong work ethic.

examples.german: Die Mitarbeiterin ist für die Organisation der Veranstaltung verantwortlich.
examples.english: The employee is responsible for organizing the event.
